name: Purge (itch) (Christian_H)
description:
Purge is a short piece of text based interactive science fiction that has many different paths. Each time you play it is possible to discover more about who you are playing as and the world that you inhabit. Plays right in your browser! 

Currently, there are 4 different endings.

Disclaimer: The game is still in development, there may be spelling errors or other strangeness. Feedback is appreciated! Thanks for playing! 

Made in Twine.
